title: Papers: Real ready £292m Haaland package
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Monday's national newspapers...

title: Equatorial Guinea shock holders Algeria
shortDescription: Esteban Obiang scored 20 minutes from time as Equatorial Guinea pulled off one of the great Africa Cup of Nations finals upsets with a 1-0 win over Algeria on Sunday.

title: Algeria 0-1 Equatorial Guinea
shortDescription: Highlights of the Africa Cup of Nations Group E match between Algeria and Equatorial Guinea.

title: Last-gasp Longhurst header snatches Hammers draw at Spurs
shortDescription: Kate Longhurst's last-gasp header snatched a late 1-1 draw for 10-player West Ham Women at Tottenham Women, who missed the chance to go second in the WSL table.

title: Euro round-up: Real claim Super Cup title
shortDescription: Real Madrid were crowned Spanish Super Cup champions after goals from Luka Modric and Karim Benzema earned them a 2-0 win over Athletic Bilbao.

title: Monday at AFCON: Who will join Cameroon in last 16?
shortDescription: Dates, kick-off times and host cities - here's the full schedule for AFCON 2021.

title: Tunisia thump Mauritania to record first AFCON win
shortDescription: Hamza Mathlouthi and Wahbi Khazri scored goals inside the opening nine minutes to set up a comfortable 4-0 victory for Tunisia over Mauritania on Sunday.

title: Sierra Leone rescue dramatic draw against Ivory Coast
shortDescription: A goalkeeping howler handed Sierra Leone a dramatic last-gasp equaliser that secured a 2-2 draw with Ivory Coast on Sunday.

title: Chelsea interested in signing PSG's Kurzawa on loan
shortDescription: Chelsea are interested in signing Paris Saint-Germain left-back Layvin Kurzawa on loan, with the 29-year-old currently out of favour at the French club.

title: Gambia, Mali remain top of AFCON Group F after 1-1 draw
shortDescription: Two late penalties awarded after intervention by VAR saw debutants Gambia hold Mali to a 1-1 draw at the Africa Cup of Nations as the teams stayed joint top of Group F.

title: Liverpool top Brentford in dominant Anfield display
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Liverpool's win over Brentford.

title: Harrison's hat-trick sees Leeds past West Ham
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Leeds' win over West Ham.

title: O'Brien winner lifts Foxes off bottom of WSL table
shortDescription: Shannon O'Brien's second-half winner lifted Leicester Women off the bottom of the WSL table after beating Brighton Women 1-0 at the King Power Stadium.

title: Harrison treble inspires thrilling Leeds win | Moyes laments fixture pile-up
shortDescription: Jack Harrison scored a superb hat-trick as depleted Leeds produced a stunning 3-2 win at West Ham to dent the hosts' Champions League hopes on Super Sunday.

title: Liverpool beat Brentford to go second
shortDescription: Goals from Fabinho, Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain and Takumi Minamino sealed a routine 3-0 win for Liverpool over Brentford, moving the Reds up to second.

title: Everton sack Benitez | Rooney, Lampard on shortlist
shortDescription: Everton have sacked manager Rafael Benitez after just six-and-a-half months in charge following Saturday's 2-1 defeat at Norwich.

title: Stoke ease past Hull to continue fine away form
shortDescription: Stoke recorded a fourth away win from their last five road trips as Jacob Brown and Tom Ince secured a dominant 2-0 triumph at Hull in the Championship.

title: Celtic vs Hibs preview: Jota faces late test
shortDescription: Team news, stats and how to follow Celtic vs Hibernian in the Scottish Premiership on Monday night.

title: Sunday's fixtures and scores
shortDescription: Follow all the scores from all today's games at home and abroad, with the likes of Roma and Inter Milan both in action.

title: Martial denies Rangnick claim: 'I will never refuse to play for Man Utd'
shortDescription: Anthony Martial has refuted Ralf Rangnick's claim that the forward refused to play for Manchester United.
